name: Hamachi The Psychotic Killer (Early Access)
description:
THIS IS NOT THE COMPLETE GAME. MORE INFORMATION BELOW.

HAMACHI THE PSYCHOTIC KILLER: A resident who has fallen deep into depression and has lost his touch with reality. Hamachi is now going on a murderous rampage due to some unseen demonic force that is filling his head with voices to kill.

You can kill everything that you see, or use your better judgment and spare these poor innocent creatures to get to the source of these desires. Your choices will effect the outcome of the story. 

Hamachi The Psychotic Killer is for purchase as an Early Access game which for this Build only includes 3 Worlds to play through.

  • Receive a steam key when the full version is released 
  • 7 worlds, 60+ levels and several bosses to fight
  • 3 endings for Pacifist, Neutral and Genocide routes, uncover Hamachi's story
  • Hardcore and Randomizer Modes
  • Name featured in the credits

Listen to some tracks from the OST Here

Purchase will go towards me and our development team, thank you.
